title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Call now, if there be any that will answer thee; and to which of the saints wilt thou turn?
lineList.cn: 你且呼求，有谁答应你。诸圣者之中，你转向那一位呢。

lineList.en: For wrath killeth the foolish man, and envy slayeth the silly one.
lineList.cn: 忿怒害死愚妄人，嫉妒杀死痴迷人。

lineList.en: I have seen the foolish taking root: but suddenly I cursed his habitation.
lineList.cn: 我曾见愚妄人扎下根，但我忽然咒诅他的住处。

lineList.en: His children are far from safety, and they are crushed in the gate, neither is there any to deliver them.
lineList.cn: 他的儿女远离稳妥的地步，在城门口被压，并无人搭救。

lineList.en: Whose harvest the hungry eateth up, and taketh it even out of the thorns, and the robber swalloweth up their substance.
lineList.cn: 他的庄稼有饥饿的人吃尽了，就是在荆棘里的也抢去了。他的财宝有网罗张口吞灭了。

lineList.en: Although affliction cometh not forth of the dust, neither doth trouble spring out of the ground;
lineList.cn: 祸患原不是从土中出来。患难也不是从地里发生。

lineList.en: Yet man is born unto trouble, as the sparks fly upward.
lineList.cn: 人生在世必遇患难，如同火星飞腾。

lineList.en: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause:
lineList.cn: 至于我，我必仰望神，把我的事情托付他。

lineList.en: Which doeth great things and unsearchable; marvellous things without number:
lineList.cn: 他行大事不可测度，行奇事不可胜数。

lineList.en: Who giveth rain upon the earth, and sendeth waters upon the fields:
lineList.cn: 降雨在地上，赐水于田里。

lineList.en: To set up on high those that be low; that those which mourn may be exalted to safety.
lineList.cn: 将卑微的安置在高处，将哀痛的举到稳妥之地。

lineList.en: He disappointeth the devices of the crafty, so that their hands cannot perform their enterprise.
lineList.cn: 破坏狡猾人的计谋，使他们所谋的不得成就。

lineList.en: He taketh the wise in their own craftiness: and the counsel of the froward is carried headlong.
lineList.cn: 他叫有智慧的中了自己的诡计，使狡诈人的计谋速速灭亡。

lineList.en: They meet with darkness in the day time, and grope in the noonday as in the night.
lineList.cn: 他们白昼遇见黑暗，午间摸索如在夜间。

lineList.en: But he saveth the poor from the sword, from their mouth, and from the hand of the mighty.
lineList.cn: 神拯救穷乏人，脱离他们口中的刀，和强暴人的手。

lineList.en: So the poor hath hope, and iniquity stoppeth her mouth.
lineList.cn: 这样，贫寒的人有指望，罪孽之辈必塞口无言。

lineList.en: Behold, happy is the man whom God correcteth: therefore despise not thou the chastening of the Almighty:
lineList.cn: 神所惩治的人是有福的。所以你不可轻看全能者的管教。

lineList.en: For he maketh sore, and bindeth up: he woundeth, and his hands make whole.
lineList.cn: 因为他打破，又缠裹。他击伤，用手医治。

lineList.en: He shall deliver thee in six troubles: yea, in seven there shall no evil touch thee.
lineList.cn: 你六次遭难，他必救你。就是七次，灾祸也无法害你。

lineList.en: In famine he shall redeem thee from death: and in war from the power of the sword.
lineList.cn: 在饥荒中，他必救你脱离死亡。在争战中，他必救你脱离刀剑的权力。

lineList.en: Thou shalt be hid from the scourge of the tongue: neither shalt thou be afraid of destruction when it cometh.
lineList.cn: 你必被隐藏，不受口舌之害。灾殃临到，你也不惧怕。

lineList.en: At destruction and famine thou shalt laugh: neither shalt thou be afraid of the beasts of the earth.
lineList.cn: 你遇见灾害饥馑，就必嬉笑。地上的野兽，你也不惧怕。

lineList.en: For thou shalt be in league with the stones of the field: and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with thee.
lineList.cn: 因为你必与田间的石头立约，田里的野兽也必与你和好。

lineList.en: And thou shalt know that thy tabernacle shall be in peace; and thou shalt visit thy habitation, and shalt not sin.
lineList.cn: 你必知道你帐棚平安，要查看你的羊圈，一无所失。

lineList.en: Thou shalt know also that thy seed shall be great, and thine offspring as the grass of the earth.
lineList.cn: 也必知道你的后裔将来发达，你的子孙像地上的青草。

lineList.en: Thou shalt come to thy grave in a full age, like as a shock of corn cometh in in his season.
lineList.cn: 你必寿高年迈才归坟墓，好像禾捆到时收藏。

lineList.en: Lo this, we have searched it, so it is; hear it, and know thou it for thy good.
lineList.cn: 这理，我们已经考察，本是如此。你须要听，要知道是与自己有益。
